message: Starting Phase 3 verification review - gathering phase handover and task status
Reading agents.py and phases.py to verify migration from JSON to SQLite
Analyzing agents.py and phases.py - checking for read_registry_with_lock usage patterns

Phase 3 review complete. VERDICT: APPROVED. Both agents.py and phases.py successfully migrated to SQLite-first pattern. state_db functions verified: get_agent_by_id, get_agents_for_task, load_task_snapshot, get_phase_agent_counts. JSON fallback correctly preserved for backwards compatibility.
